translation: I acknowledge receipt of your letter dated the 11th of the current month, and of the responses to Your Excellency D. Ana Joaquina da Silva Santos, D. Guiomar Maria Soares, Júlio César Centeno, and Joaquim Vieira Braga, which accompanied it, and which I will present to His Excellency.
